text: Nimage tilidirali, ihalokada badukembudu kevala ata, vinoda, alankara, nim'ma naduvana paraspara jambha mattu santana hagu sampattina spardhe matravagide â€“ male suridaga raitanige tanna bele candaganuvante. A balika adu onagalarambhisuttade mattu nivu noduttiddanteye adu (bele) haladiyaguttade mattu konege curu curagi biduttade. Atta, paralokadalli (ondede) kathina sikseyu ide mattu (innondede) allahana kadeyinda ksame hagu prasannateyu ide. Ihalokada baduku kevala vancaka sadhanavagide
